transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Ji mam good afternoon. Gaurav baat kar raha tha mam India Mart se.
Customer: Haan ji sir boliye.
Executive: Ji mam abhi sir ka number mila hua tha to main ye bol raha tha India Mart ke aap hi service handle kar rahi hai na mam.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan to mam ek bar just leads vagera ka jo issue tha last time meri baat bhi hui thi aap se hi to wo leads ko maine aapko whatsapp pe share kiya tha but wo mam ka number dusra tha shayad.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: To isliye maine aapke number pe kuch leads share ki aap ye leads ko ek bar consume karna shuru karo kyun kya hai na abhi jaise aap jo aap wo bol rahe the ki capacity wala ki aap 5000 ke upar ki capacity nahi deal karte hain to as reason ye hai ki uski leads itna nahi aa rahi hai aap leads consumption start karenge jaise abhi maine aapko whatsapp pe bhi bhejiye 500 500 LPH ke aapki capacity ki hai to aap aise leads consume karenge to fir aapke pass aana shuru ho jayenge leads ka flow badhega mam abhi kya aap capacity ke hisab se aap use kar aur uske is vajah se aap aur leads consume nahi kar pa rahe to leads aa bhi nahi rahi hai aapke pass abhi aap use karna shuru kariye to waha se pattern set hoga ki ha aap is product mein deal karte hain capacity to fir wo ho jayega kyunki capacity waha pe jo leads aati hai aapke waha pe capacity ke hisab se nahi aati wo to aapke category ke hisab se aati hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Category ke hisab se aana shuru hogi to fir capacity to baad mein aap waha pe dekh hi sakte hain fir abhi man lijiye 500 ki aari kuch 1000 ki bhi aa rahi hai 2000 ki bhi aa rahi hai to waha pe aap fir baat kar sakte ho buyer se abhi kya ho raha hai ki aap us tarah ki leads consume hi nahi kar rahe ho ki ye 500 500 uski capacity ki hum isko use nahi kar rahe hain to leads hi nahi aa pa rahi hain.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To aap use kariye dekhiye maine abhi abhi bhi aapko ek whatsapp pe bheje agar dekha hoga aapne Maharashtra ki lead hai water purification system ki ek bar aap open kariye udhar se hi bhejenge to aapko link dikh jayegi.
Customer: Ji dikhti hai.
Executive: Okay sir.
Executive: Aap ek bar hi bhejenge to link aapko dikh jayega whatsapp ek bar hi bhejiye to wo list aap dekhiye maine bheja hua hai 500 ki aur bhi leads hai agar aap open karenge India Mart pehle pehle to aur bhi leads to yahi bol raha hu ki aap pehle leads apni jo category ki aa rahi hai usko consume karna shuru kariye abhi capacity aap mat dekhiye at least kyunki jo leads hoti hai buyer jo bejta hai wo hamari bali team ke pass jati hai to product and category ke hisab se hi jati hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab wo kya hai wo aapko category ke hisab se product ke hisab se leads share karte hain waha pe capacity ka waha pe criteria nahi hai to wo to aapke end se hota hai ki aap laga ke aapke kam ki hai ki nahi order value aapke kam ka hai ki nahi wo aap apne end se set kar sakte ho to wo ye hai ki abhi aap kya kar rahe ho us tarah ke product ke leads to aa bhi rahi hai to aap capacity ke hisab se consume nahi kar rahe ho ki mere capacity hai nahi itni hum deal nahi karte to is vajah se bilkul hi leads nahi aa pa rahi hain abhi pehle aap leads consumption start kariye fir automatic aapke pass badhega kyunki abhi agar main dekh raha hu just abhi aap dekhenge Himachal Pradesh ki ek lead aayi hai water purification system ki 19 minute hue hain mam capacity nahi dala but aap isko use karoge to is category matlab aapka ye set ho jayega aap isme deal karte ho water purification system mein aur is tarah ki puri leads aap fir RO ki hi aati rehti hai fir aur kisi ki aati nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi main ye nahi bol raha ki aap ek hi product aap multiple jo products hai usko aap search karke bhi by list ke upar search kar nahi nahi search karte hain to nahi aati ki hai hi nahi relevant lead hai hi nahi no relevant abhi aap ek bar open kariye India Mart ek bar open kariye aap dekhiye main to abhi dekh raha hu mujhe ek water purification ki dikh rahi hai 19 minute pehle ki aur ek aapke media ki aa rahi hai max design pressure 10 to 15 bar aur inka order value 1 lakh ke upar ka hai FRB material FRB dala hua hai inhone.
Executive: Aisa nahi hum leads hai aap agar jis product ki chaiye waha pe aap search karke bhi aap consume kar sakte hain matlab aap upar jaiye by ka waha pe search ka option aata hai aap search bhi karenge to waha pe aapko dikh jayegi ek ye dekhiye maine ek aur aapko bheja hua hai Kerala ki lead hai FRB ki.
Executive: Dekhiye maine aapko do teen char lead bheji hui hai aur ye capacity bhi matlab product se relevant hai category aapki aur capacity bhi ek ki 1000 ki hai Kerala ki hai ek jo maine aapko bheji hui hai unka order value 1 lakh ke upar ka hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ye wahi main bola aap isko use karenge na to category aur pattern set ho jayega ha aap is product mein is category mein aap deal karte ho to automatic aapke pass leads ka flow badhega aur ek jaise main dekh raha hu abhi padi hui hai Jalgaon ki super clean filter ki isme bhi shayad aap deal karte ho.
Executive: Ye sari aapke kam ki hai na leads to.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough leads.

- Only receiving leads for RO products.

- Capacity is set to 5000, not dealing above it.

Resolution:

- Executive shared leads on WhatsApp.

- Advised to consume leads irrespective of capacity.

- Explained how leads are generated based on category.

- Suggested using the search option for specific products.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, capacity, category, product, search
